title: Howe ´delighted´ for Wood this season after impressive goalscoring record
description: Eddie Howe paid tribute to the in-form Chris Wood ahead of reuniting with the former Newcastle United forward when they face Nottingham Forest on Sunday. Howe’s Newcastle are currently seventh in the Premier League table, trailing the top four by three points, and can go to within a point of third-placed Forest with victory at […] The post Howe ´delighted´ for Wood this season after impressive goalscoring record appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Simeone always knew Alvarez shared Atletico Madrid´s DNA
description: Diego Simeone heaped praise on Julian Alvarez after he scored twice in Atletico Madrid’s 3-0 win at Valencia, saying he always knew the Argentine shared the club’s DNA. Alvarez – who was a €75million acquisition from Manchester City ahead of this season – struck twice in the first half-hour before Angel Correa added a late […] The post Simeone always knew Alvarez shared Atletico Madrid´s DNA appeared first on Soccer News.
